titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to Louisville & Nashville Railroad Company
CWG13734

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 5

body.p:
NO. 22.
The United States,
To LOUISVILLE & NASHVILLE RAILROAD COMPANY, Dr
1862 For Transportation as follows viz Miles Rate Amount
November 4 Men 35th Ky vols From Bowling Green To Franklin 202 c2¢ 1 616
" 1 " " " " To Munfordville & Return 812 " " 1 624
" 3 ✓ " " " " " Franklin and } 202
" 6 " " Returning " Franklin " Bowling Green Ky } 202 " " 3 636
" 4 " " From " " " "
" " 1 616
Add United States tax on Passenger Transpn
8 492/10
Pr circular Q M Genl, date Novr 14/62 849 @3¢
25
$8 74
I Certify that the Transportation as above charged was on Bussiness connected with the recruiting Service Under the orders of the Govenor of the State of Kentucky --

John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl. Ken. Vols.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the Public Service.
Received at Frankfort Ky the 18 of April 18623., of Jno W Finnell Adj. Genl. Ky Volunteers Quartermaster U.S. Army, the sum of Eight Dollars, and Seventy four cents, in full of the above amount.

NO. 22.
No. 161 Abstract B P Qr. 1862.
Lou & Nash R R co
Dollars $8 75/100
Paid April 18 18623.
